title: Reroute Wastewater Flow to Prevent Overflow
description: During a heavy storm, a wastewater interceptor is nearing capacity. An operator must reroute flow to a storage basin to prevent a sanitary sewer overflow.

tasks.description: Receive a 'High Level' alert for the 'Elm Street Interceptor'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent acknowledges the critical wastewater system alert.

tasks.description: Check the current level of the nearby 'Emergency Storage Basin'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the storage basin has sufficient capacity.

tasks.description: Remotely open a valve to divert a portion of the wastewater flow from the interceptor to the storage basin.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully operates the valve to prevent an overflow.
